entries.title: Configuring MCP Server service + PAT
features: Added secure MCP transport endpoint and runtime bootstrap
Enabled PAT-backed MCP access with scope-aware execution
Connected package + deployment wiring for MCP startup
entries.reason: Provide production-safe, token-scoped MCP access for agent runtimes.
details: Introduced PAT token workflows aligned with MCP server execution
Connected service startup so MCP is available at deploy runtime
Laid groundwork for consistent SDK and MCP tool parity
entries.author: Savage

entries.title: Persisted chat ops, agent feed separation, and presence tabs
features: Persistent chat storage with delete, upvote, and downvote operations
Dedicated agent feed separation from user chat surface
Presence tracking and deployment-safe migration flow
entries.reason: Stabilize multi-actor chat behavior and prepare agent-aware UX safely.
details: Added session/message persistence with mutation pathways
Separated agent-origin message handling from standard user chat stream
Prepared migration-safe deployment behavior for these changes
entries.author: Savage

entries.title: Web patches and UI refinements
features: Applied border-centric UI alignment patches across key surfaces
Refined spacing, framing, and visual consistency details
Improved cohesion with homepage/dashboard visual language
entries.reason: Keep product surfaces aligned to the border-centric design system.
details: Reduced styling drift between sections and pages
Adjusted layout edges and border behavior for consistency
Improved overall visual rhythm in the web app
entries.author: Savage

entries.title: Dual-vault frontend support (V2 + V1)
features: Extended frontend fee reads to include both FeeVault V2 and V1
Improved continuity for users during vault transition
Kept fee visibility consistent across legacy and new contracts
entries.reason: Support migration period without breaking user fee visibility.
details: Updated fee hooks to aggregate across vault versions
Preserved expected dashboard totals during contract transition
Reduced user confusion around missing fee balances
entries.author: xodivc xode

entries.title: V2 contract integration for claims and fee collection
features: Integrated V2 contract paths for claims and fee collection
Added dual-vault behavior to support ongoing migration
Aligned frontend and backend flows with V2 rollout
entries.reason: Migrate core protocol operations to newer vault architecture.
details: Updated claim and fee routing logic for V2 compatibility
Kept fallback/parallel behavior for V1 where needed
Improved long-term contract upgrade readiness
entries.author: xodivc xode

entries.title: Removed hardcoded deployer private key
features: Eliminated hardcoded secret material from scripts
Moved sensitive configuration to environment-based flow
Reduced accidental secret exposure risk
entries.reason: Enforce safer operational security and secret handling.
details: Deleted explicit private key values from repository scripts
Kept script behavior driven by environment variables
Improved security posture for local and CI execution
entries.author: xodivc xode

entries.title: Portfolio balance fixes and withdraw/send support
features: Corrected portfolio balance behavior
Added withdraw/send wallet actions
Improved fund-management usability for builders
entries.reason: Resolve financial UX friction and unblock wallet operations.
details: Fixed balance display mismatch in portfolio flow
Added transaction paths for outbound transfers
Improved practical wallet utility in day-to-day usage
entries.author: xodivc xode

entries.title: Added .sigil attestation scan endpoint and CLI package
features: Added .sigil file attestation support
Introduced scan endpoint for verification workflows
Published CLI package for developer automation
entries.reason: Enable portable attestations and cleaner developer tooling paths.
details: Expanded verification surface with .sigil artifact support
Connected server scan flow to attestation pipeline
Improved command-line integration for builder workflows
entries.author: xodivc xode

entries.title: Connected /connect handshake to real API flow
features: Replaced placeholder handshake interactions with real API calls
Connected runtime handshake lifecycle to backend persistence
Enabled practical connect flow for deployed bot runtimes
entries.reason: Move connect experience from mock to operational behavior.
details: Wired handshake request/response flow through backend route
Stored connected runtime records after successful handshake
Unlocked real control-plane behavior for connected bots
entries.author: xodivc xode

entries.title: Fixed claimable USDC derivation
features: Corrected claimable USDC calculation logic
Aligned displayed claimable value with on-chain realities
Reduced false-positive claimable balances
entries.reason: Prevent incorrect claim states and claim transaction failures.
details: Derived claimable from accrued DB fees minus lifetime earned on-chain
Improved consistency between displayed and actual claim outcomes
Reduced user-facing revert scenarios in claim flow
entries.author: xodivc xode
